raw_data.description: Community-oriented and family-owned independent bookshop with great books, records, games, beer, wine, and community events.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 1 hour here

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing shop!
Good books, good vibes. Cute little book shop!
One of my fav bookstores, great vibe & selection & the shop dog libby is a huge plus

Good selection of books, friendly staff, and the blind date with a book club offerings are so fun and a great way to connect with readers! With 6 books to choose from each month, there’s always a book club for everyone! The downtown location is great and so cute!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming in Kimberly!

reviews_data.review_text: Super kind staff. Awesome selection

Belmont Bookshop is a small town gem. The space is cozy, the selection is thoughtful, and the staff is genuinely helpful. You feel welcome the second you walk in.

And then there’s Libby, the shop dog and absolute highlight of every visit. She’s sweet, gentle, great with kids, and makes the place feel even more special.

If you love books and good vibes, this is your spot. Don’t miss it.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for visiting Robert! We're glad you enjoyed your time at the Bookshop!

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont Bookshop is adorable and always a joy to visit. Cacy gives the best book recommendations—every pick has been spot-on! It’s the perfect cozy spot for book lovers.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting - Cacy does give wonderful recommendations!

reviews_data.review_text: I love stopping in at Belmont Bookshop - they somehow always know exactly what new book I need. The staff is extremely welcoming and excited to help me find something new and interesting. They have such a great collection of fiction and non-fiction books, plus they have the cutest bookmarks and book accessories. I wish my dog was more like Libby so I could let her hang out and get all the love. So glad this spot exists
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words! We're excited to exist for the community :)

reviews_data.review_text: Truly love this place - such a comfortable environment created for the community to continue to learn and grow together.  I really love the back patio and welcoming humans and the lovely little furball Libby!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby loves that back patio as well ha!

reviews_data.review_text: I visited this book store a month ago when visiting Belmont from Ohio and bought the first book in the Red Rising Series. This is such a cute place with friendly staff. I have tried to find places similar here in Ohio but locally owned bookstores are hard to find nowadays. Get off your e-readers, look around and grab a real book! Support your local businesses!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Real books are the best!

reviews_data.review_text: Cacy was so nice and helpful! Will be back soon.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We look forward to seeing you soon Bryson!

reviews_data.review_text:
This bookshop is an absolute gem!

Hands down, the cutest bookstore I’ve been to in ages. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the staff is not only incredibly friendly but also super knowledgeable about books. They really know how to make you feel at home. For those looking to connect with others, they offer a wide variety of book clubs - such a great way to meet people and engage with the community.

The shop also has a delightful kids’ corner, cozy reading nooks, and a lovely outdoor space perfect for enjoying a good book when the weather’s nice. The carefully curated selection of books makes even just browsing a joy.

But, without a doubt, the highlight of every visit is Libby, the sweetest, most chill dog you’ll ever meet. She’s the perfect bookshop companion and always adds an extra dose of warmth to the experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for your support Kelly! We can't wait to see you at book club soon - we have so many books to discuss!

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookstore with a super cute and sweet dog!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby says "hi" and hopes to see you soon Linda!

reviews_data.review_text: I love small town book stores and this one of best I’ve ever been in. From lazy dog  that was the nicest dog ever to homey feeling it was awesome.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you feel at home here, Ryan!

reviews_data.review_text: This is an incredible book store! My family has been coming since they opened over a year ago. They do an amazing job hosting events and partnering with the local community. They've teamed up with other businesses to host themed book clubs where you get to enjoy the book and visit another business you may not have before (like whiskey tasting at the jailhouse and throwing the first pitch at a baseball game!). They've hosted game nights, which are a lot of fun as well, and have a good selection of beers for game night! They've had local artists decorate their shop. The painted kids stairs up to the treehouse are especially cute! Each stair is painted by a different artist based on a children's book. I highly recommend visiting, and their rewards program is well worth it! (Plus, they have the best bookshop dog! We love seeing her when we visiting and our son loves to sneak her snacks.)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the support, Alec! Libby loves the snacks she "sneaks" from all the little ones :)

reviews_data.review_text: This is a beautiful bookshop with a finely curated selection. I loved the decor and community feel, and my kid loved the themed loft. Super friendly and welcoming. I’d be there all the time if I lived closer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Come visit us anytime you're nearby, Nicholas!

reviews_data.review_text:
I will start by saying we have always enjoyed visiting the Belmont bookshop, especially with our kids who love the children’s area. Unfortunately, something very upsetting happened during our most recent visit that I feel obligated to share, especially for families.

After checking out, my 4-year-old daughter gently petted the store dog on the head. The dog suddenly stood and lunged toward her face in an aggressive way. Thankfully, no contact was made, but it was close enough to seriously frighten both of us. The owner’s husband was present and witnessed the incident, but said nothing. When I voiced concern and said the dog nearly bit my child, the owner became extremely defensive and dismissive, which only added to the distress of the situation.

It’s deeply upsetting that the owner showed ZERO concern for a child’s safety. I understand people love their pets, but when you choose to have a dog in a public space—especially one frequented by children—there’s a responsibility to ensure everyone is safe and to respond with compassion if something goes wrong.

We won’t be returning.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
This is Brian, co-owner of Belmont Bookshop. I was not present during your visit, but after reading your review, I reviewed the shop's security footage from multiple angles to better understand what happened. 

The footage shows that Libby was lying quietly near the community puzzle table when a different family with a child approached her. Shortly afterwards, your children ran up to pet her. At one point, your daughter leaned over and placed her face close to Libby's while also attempting to lay on her or give her a hug. Libby responded by standing up quickly and vocalizing through a very small, startled yelp (not a bark or growl) that she was uncomfortable before immediately moving away behind the counter. There was no contact made, no lunging, no showing of her teeth, no chasing, and her body language (including a wagging tail) does not suggest any aggression.

Notably, during this same interaction, the other customer was comfortably allowing his young daughter to continue petting Libby, suggesting that other families present did not perceive any concerning behavior.

We understand that this moment felt startling to you as a parent. The footage shows your daughter standing up and running back to you, and while she didn't appear visibly distressed initially, we recognize that the situation became upsetting for your family.

Kristina was present for the entire event and did attempt to acknowledge your expressed concern, while also explaining that Libby did not attempt to bite your daughter and that we regularly ask visitors, especially parents of young children, to help us ensure basic dog etiquette is followed such as asking the owner before petting an unfamiliar dog, and not hugging, leaning on, or putting faces too close to unfamiliar dogs.

Libby, our shop dog, is an important part of our community and the bookshop. She is beloved by almost all visitors, including many young children and families. You are correct that it is always our responsibility to ensure that Libby, our space, and our customers feel safe and always welcome, and please know that we take this type of event very seriously.

If our response came across as dismissive in the moment, we truly apologize. That was never our intention. We care deeply about the safety and comfort of every visitor to our shop, and we are always working to ensure both Libby and our customers have positive interactions.

We're truly sorry to hear you don't plan to return. If you ever change your mind, we'd welcome the chance to reconnect and ensure your family feels comfortable here again.

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookstore with lots of genres. Friendly helpful staff. A great place to browse
reviews_data.owner_answer: And the inventory is always rotating so hopefully we have some new great selections to browse next time you're in!

reviews_data.review_text: Great people and great books. Plus a nice relaxed atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you enjoyed your visit Travis!

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookstore with a very cute employee named Libby.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby is employee of the month...every month! haha

reviews_data.review_text: I just love this book store! Came here back in October with my daughter and sister. They have an adorable kids loft area. I have daydreamed about the puzzle table. So, finally, 8 months later, after having my second baby, I was able to slip away to this lovely store to work on a puzzle and pick a new book for book club.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you got some time away to work on the community puzzle! It's always ready for you :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great little book shop, good selection great vibes
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Michener! Thank you so much for making the time to share your review. We look forward to welcoming you back!

reviews_data.review_text:
Lovely independent bookshop in the quaint little downtown of Belmont! Nicely curated selection, there’s something for everyone.

Beware of the shop dog, Libby! She is an aggressive salesdog and hustled me to buy a bag of locally made dog treats that they sell at the counter.😆
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks for coming by, Leigh! Libby loves those dog treats and we hope your dog does too! 
P.S. for anybody reading this review and not seeing the humor in it at first, Libby is very sweet and most certainly not aggressive :) She does indeed love these treats though!

reviews_data.review_text: What a gem. Not only is the store lovely and inviting and the staff kind and knowledgeable, but they also have books that are sometimes hard to find, in stock.  Loved my visit and will definitely make a must when in the area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Stacy! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back in on your next trip to the area!

reviews_data.review_text: We visited Belmont Bookshop for the first time in support of indie bookshop day. This is such a whimsical welcoming cozy shop. The staff members are so friendly and the selection is literally beautiful and current with the times. Each book I thought to look for was available on the shelf.  I also love the variety of events offered for different ages. You definitely MUST plan a visit to this shop.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for spending some time with us and taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience. We hope yo see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
This bookstore is an absolute gem! The selection of books is so thoughtfully curated — I kept stumbling across titles I’d never seen anywhere else, but instantly wanted to read. It’s the kind of place where you can lose yourself for hours just exploring the shelves.

The adorable doggy makes it the best experience ever. She is so well behaved and absolutely makes my day!

The staff is just as wonderful — welcoming, and genuinely excited to help you find your next favorite book. They clearly love what they do.

The vibe of the entire place is perfect: cozy, inviting, and full of little nooks that make you want to curl up with a book right then and there.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this kind review, Nil! We're glad to hear you had such a great time. Come back anytime and spend as much time as you like browsing, petting Libby, reading, or working on the puzzle!

reviews_data.review_text: This cozy bookshop is just what Belmont needed! They have something for everyone, including plants and wine! Who doesn’t love that? The owner is one of the sweetest people I’ve ever met, and it’s also a plus that she is usually joined by her sweet dog Libby. They have a great upstairs area for children’s books and host many events throughout the week with local authors, book readings, and more!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kristin! Thank you for spending time with us and being so kind yourself!

reviews_data.review_text:
LOVE THE VIBES. ADORABLE SHOP.

Staff was extremely friendly and the store dog was super chill. She is a very good girl and is extremely sweet. She has the temperament of a stuffed animal. I love the selection they have and unfortunately I did not find any new book that really grabbed me today. I am personally a romantasy fan and I already own many of the books they offered. I really wanted to get a blind book but none of them interested me today. I will recommend this shop to my friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Valerie! Thanks for coming by and spending your afternoon with us. We're glad you enjoyed yourself and felt comfortable. You might be happy to learn that we will soon be expanding a few areas of the bookshop to carry even more titles! We hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this bookshop, they have a great collection of special edition classics and the cute little children’s section upstairs feels like a cool fort. Plus a cute dog! A great addition to the downtown Belmont area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words, Kerrigan! We look forward to welcoming you into the shop on your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: I am participating in the Greater Charlotte book crawl, and this is my first visit to this bookstore. The owner is super sweet and the dog is absolutely adorable. The place is very cozy and has a wide array of romance books, though if you prefer dark romance, there is a very small selection, majority of it is romantsy and romcom. I asked, what is the process for local authors who have their books in that store and there are 2 ways the first way is going to their website and filling out a form. Basically pitching your book, and you go from there. Another way is scheduling an event where you go in-store and basically have a table with your books and you can have one-on-one interaction with potential readers that will buy books from you.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Dana! Thank you making the time to visit all the different bookstores during the GCBC and leaving us a kind review. We recently added Community Nights to our event grid as a way to highlight and celebrate local creators, authors, and artists in a more intentional way. Details are now available on our website under the "Creators" tab. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great bookstore with great gift items too! So thankful to have this in Belmont now!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Amy! We are so thankful to be in a community of supportive people like you!

reviews_data.review_text: Small busy bookstore.  Stopped by passing through from Charlotte, it was packed on a Sunday afternoon.  Their personal shopper was having none of it.  It's all new books, mostly fiction but I managed to find something from my nerd crush to buy.  They had some other interesting books I added to my list.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Malcolm, thanks for taking the time out of your day to visit us on your trip. Next time you are in the area, we hope you'll visit us again and we will be happy to assist you with recommendations or in whatever way we can.

reviews_data.review_text: Very cute little bookshop. Lots of variety in the books offered and the sweetest bookshop pup. They also have drinks and puzzles and things to participate in as well. The kids are upstairs is also really cute.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting! We hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic book store, with a great atmosphere
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Alex! We're glad you enjoyed your time with us.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute bookstore! They have a wide variety of products and my friend had a great time purchasing things!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Rabori, thanks for dropping in! Come back anytime :)

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookshop in lovely Downtown Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi John, thank you for spending time with us and for the great photos! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Cute, downtown book shop with lots of great options.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Love this photo! Thanks for dropping by and spending time with us!

reviews_data.review_text: A wonderful local bookstore that is both cozy and charming. Plus, they have a chill dog. What more could you want?
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby says Hi, Lauryn! Thanks for the kind words :)

reviews_data.review_text: This bookstore is adorable!! Good selection and very friendly staff. Also very kid-friendly.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Michelle!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely adorable bookstore. They have plants, puzzles a children corner upstairs. We loved it here! I will definitely check out their upcoming events :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Vanessa! Thanks so much for coming by and for taking great photos of the shop! We hope you'll join us for some upcoming events which we continue to add to our website!

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection of books. I found some of the favorite books from my younger days along with authors that I'm reading now. Staff is very good at helping me explore books that I haven't read that I’d enjoy. They've made some great recommendations for books I never would have found on my own. And the coffee - just delicious. I always bring home a bag when I visit.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting, Jack! We love our partnership with Enderly Coffee in Charlotte and plan to have our house blend of coffee at all times!

reviews_data.review_text:
If you want to find out where a town is headed, there is no better gauge than its local book store.

Good selection and they quickly helped me find the book I was after.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Duncan! We love our town and are glad that you are a part of our story!

reviews_data.review_text: Beautiful store, great atmosphere. Good selection of books and a few plants.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Joe! Glad to hear your Monstera is healthy and it was nice to chat again. We've got even more plants coming in and look forward to seeing you again next time!

reviews_data.review_text: Very nice store and great customer service.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Kevin! Look forward to seeing you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookstore. Nice book selection for kids and young adults.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you feel cozy at the Bookshop, Ceyleen! A relaxed, welcoming, and comfortable atmosphere is our mission.

reviews_data.review_text: Not much of a selection, small store, but what they do have is lovely and well worth a stroll.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kathleen - thank you for visiting and the kind words! We have about 4,000 titles in our 1,200 square feet, about 30% of which are community recommendations. We intentionally carry only one copy of almost all titles in order to have a wider variety across all genres. But we're always looking for more / new recommendations and we do special orders daily, if there is ever something you're looking for but didn't see in the Bookshop, just let us know!

reviews_data.review_text:
I was visiting family in town and found your bookstore so charming. You helped me find an historical novel and you picked "What the Mountains Remember"
Being from Buffalo, I read the Inn was furnished by the Roycrofts from East Aurora. Loved this book and many thanks!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Mary, So glad you enjoyed the Bookshop and "What the Mountains Remember!" Come back and see us (especially when you need a break from the Buffalo cold)!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a well curated nonfiction section!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much! We are always working to expand, rotate, and find new and old titles to bring into the Bookshop. Let us know if there are any you're looking for in particular and we can special order or carry on our shelves.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to browse and buy some unique items. Love the atmosphere and decor. Will definitely become a returning shopper!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words! Let us know if there is ever any super unique items you're looking for but can't find elsewhere; we're always rotating our inventory.

reviews_data.review_text: The vibe is really lovely and cute and their book selection is awesome! The people working there are also very friendly and helpful. Both times I’ve come in, I had no idea what book I wanted to get but got great recommendations from the people working!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Maddy, this makes us so happy to hear! Our team loves giving recommendations and appreciate you being willing to take them!

reviews_data.review_text: The cutest little book shop! They have a ton of books and everyone is very kind and helpful. Will now buy all of my books from here!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Jordan! We appreciate your kind words and your support!

reviews_data.review_text:
Our family absolutely loves this gem. The space for the children is small, but the cutest thing ever. We also love seeing Libby (the dog) as well.

The selection of books is amazing. We easily find books that we want here.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Nyetta! Libby always loves to see you and the family as well :)

reviews_data.review_text: Really comfy chairs and inviting. Great to grab a drink and sit down to start your new book. Really organized and a great location right on the main downtown strip in Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Oh so glad you enjoy the comfy chairs! They are all different but such fun to pick a favorite and snuggle in with a good book.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute little bookshop! Libby is the best and so are her human coworkers.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Haha Libby definitely IS the best! Hardest working employee and star of the show ;)

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookshop with wide selection and friendly people. We love stopping in here after Sunday brunch at the Everyday Market. We haven't been to any events yet but we're looking forward to it. Stop in and say hello and pick up a new read!
reviews_data.owner_answer: What could be better than Sunday brunch and bookshops?! We have a ton of upcoming events, located on our social media and our website events calendar: https://belmontbookshop.com/events

reviews_data.review_text: It's a cute local owner bookstore with a home town cozy feeling. They even had their dog that walks around greeting each new customer. She was very sweet and Adorable.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby is a wonderful greeter and can't wait to see you soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Super cute, fun little book shop in downtown Belmont. Curated reads and an engaging owner make for a great spot. My daughter picked up ‘blind date with a book’- such a fun concept! Looks like she serves beer, wine and NA options as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Blind Date books are so much fun! We even have our Blind Date Book Club, similar concept where you don't know what you're going to read, but we give you the genre and clues. Each month is themed and the groups get together to discuss after a month!

reviews_data.review_text: I absolutely adore Belmont Bookshop! 📚 It's the most charming and cozy independent bookshop I've ever been to. The owners are incredibly warm and friendly, and they even host a variety of fantastic book clubs. Belmont Bookshop has definitely won my heart and become my new go-to spot! ❤️
reviews_data.owner_answer: Brandy, what an incredibly kind and heartwarming note! We are so happy the Bookshop is warm and cozy for you! Our book clubs are so much fun (and we've got several new groups on the calendar this year!)

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere, great selection, and I loved having a furry friend to greet me and accompany me as I shopped
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming in, Katie! Libby says "Hi!" :)

reviews_data.review_text:
Belmont Bookshop is a gem! It has the cutest kid area and is conveniently located in downtown Belmont, making it a perfect stop on a family day trip downtown!

Run, don’t walk!

(PS: While you’re there, make sure you say hi to Libby! That sweetest bookshop dog ever.
reviews_data.owner_answer: And while at the Bookshop, be sure to pick up a copy of Eden's book: Arnie the Armadillo!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to relax with a book, or coffee, or tea, or all three.
reviews_data.owner_answer: (plus wine and beer and mocktails and puzzles and...) :)

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont Bookshop is a charming and delightful nook with a great selection of best selling books and the sweetest bookshop dog you ever will meet! Between book clubs, collaborative community events, and a “frequent shopper” rewards program, this gem in downtown Belmont stole my heart the second I entered the door! I will most certainly return often to cozy up with the latest non-fiction release and snuggles from Libby.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the incredibly kind words and support Nicole! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Super cute store. It's so well organized and a very friendly environment. I will definitely be coming back to support this small bookstore.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your support Madison!

reviews_data.review_text: The most magical little bookstore!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Aww we love this so much!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection and vibes!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting!

reviews_data.review_text: They have robo book nook kits! And serve wine! Also the street they are on is so cute with lots of good places to eat!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming to see us and for sharing your nice photos, Elaine! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Extremely friendly staff, a wild range of new books. If you love nature and plants they have a great nature selection with indoor plants for sale. Will come back :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Tori! We look forward to seeing you again :)

reviews_data.review_text: We recently visited Belmont Bookshop for the first time and found it to be a charming, local book seller. Street parking is available as well as a nearby gravel lot. We were greeted by a friendly pup at the door and found a smaller but excellent selection of new books to browse. Our toddler also enjoyed the treehouse area at the back of the store. Of course, we left with a few new books. We will certainly stop back in the next time we visit downtown Belmont!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit to Belmont and to the shop! Hope to see you again!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is unbelievably charming, welcoming, and has some really cool things.  What a great addition to our area. Thanks for the excellent service, Brian!
reviews_data.owner_answer: It was so nice visiting with you Heidi! Hope you come back and visit again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Cute bookstore
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting Alicia - we hope you will visit again!

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont's newest gem - and what a gem it is! There is so much packed into this amazing space - puzzles, plants, books, stationary, and tons more. It is airy and organized. The upstairs Tree House is an especially sweet spot, and the community puzzle is right up my alley. The owner Christina is so friendly and helpful. Can't wait to go back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the review Rebecca! We appreciate you visiting us and hope you will come back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: 10/10 book store! Owners are SO kind & Libby (their dog) hangs out and greets guests. A must shop!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind review, Ally! Hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: What a gem! Visiting from out of town and wandered in here. This is one of the best book stores I have ever visited. Everything was so bright and clean. Books were neatly organized and easy to find. Owner was very nice and helpful.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the kind review and for visiting! We are glad too see that you enjoyed your experience!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place it’s a vibe and the associates are really nice.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Great to meet you Shawna - thanks for dropping us a note and glad you enjoyed your experience at the shop. Look forward to welcoming you back!

reviews_data.review_text: Great addition to the Belmont Main Street. Very dog friendly.  Great selection on books for the adult reader.  If you have children make sure you check out the upstairs tree house for the younger reader. If you develop a thirst walking around Belmont they do have beer and wine along with other non alcoholic beverages.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the note, Howard. Glad you enjoyed our shop and look forward to seeing you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Love the kids nook in the upper section... good selection of books for a smaller store. Cozy feel
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you like the kid's Treehouse, the selection, and the cozy vibes Joshua! We appreciate your support.

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful place to find books and gifts. The owners are so kind and give great book recommendations.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Susana!

reviews_data.review_text:
What an incredible addition to Downtown Belmont! A book store and so much more. See it for yourself. Plants, books, records and coming soon, wine by the glass!

A perfect place to meet up with your friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
+ stationary, greeting cards & journals, board games, candles, and beer :)
And most importantly: our shop dog Libby!

reviews_data.review_text: Took my 3 year old grandson to the park, to get an ice cream cone and to visit Belmont Bookshop. As I tucked him into bed that night we talked about his busy day I asked what part of the day was his favorite.  I got a resounding “Bookstore” as an answer!! Going back again today to buy the book he wanted!
reviews_data.owner_answer: This makes us so happy! Thank you for sharing, your support, and coming back to see us!

reviews_data.review_text: Very cool!!! Nothing like shopping in an actual book store!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming in Abbey! We look forward to seeing you again soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: The treehouse area for kids is adorable and the owners are so friendly. We will definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for visiting us! We can't wait to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: What a great spot! Quaint and charming, with a surprisingly nice selection of books. The owners are amazing, and we are very excited to have them in Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting, Michael! We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!

raw_data.name: Belmont Bookshop

raw_data.description: Community-oriented and family-owned independent bookshop with great books, records, games, beer, wine, and community events.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 1 hour here

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing shop!
Good books, good vibes. Cute little book shop!
One of my fav bookstores, great vibe & selection & the shop dog libby is a huge plus

Good selection of books, friendly staff, and the blind date with a book club offerings are so fun and a great way to connect with readers! With 6 books to choose from each month, there’s always a book club for everyone! The downtown location is great and so cute!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming in Kimberly!

reviews_data.review_text: Super kind staff. Awesome selection

Belmont Bookshop is a small town gem. The space is cozy, the selection is thoughtful, and the staff is genuinely helpful. You feel welcome the second you walk in.

And then there’s Libby, the shop dog and absolute highlight of every visit. She’s sweet, gentle, great with kids, and makes the place feel even more special.

If you love books and good vibes, this is your spot. Don’t miss it.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for visiting Robert! We're glad you enjoyed your time at the Bookshop!

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont Bookshop is adorable and always a joy to visit. Cacy gives the best book recommendations—every pick has been spot-on! It’s the perfect cozy spot for book lovers.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting - Cacy does give wonderful recommendations!

reviews_data.review_text: I love stopping in at Belmont Bookshop - they somehow always know exactly what new book I need. The staff is extremely welcoming and excited to help me find something new and interesting. They have such a great collection of fiction and non-fiction books, plus they have the cutest bookmarks and book accessories. I wish my dog was more like Libby so I could let her hang out and get all the love. So glad this spot exists
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words! We're excited to exist for the community :)

reviews_data.review_text: Truly love this place - such a comfortable environment created for the community to continue to learn and grow together.  I really love the back patio and welcoming humans and the lovely little furball Libby!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby loves that back patio as well ha!

reviews_data.review_text: I visited this book store a month ago when visiting Belmont from Ohio and bought the first book in the Red Rising Series. This is such a cute place with friendly staff. I have tried to find places similar here in Ohio but locally owned bookstores are hard to find nowadays. Get off your e-readers, look around and grab a real book! Support your local businesses!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Real books are the best!

reviews_data.review_text: Cacy was so nice and helpful! Will be back soon.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We look forward to seeing you soon Bryson!

reviews_data.review_text:
This bookshop is an absolute gem!

Hands down, the cutest bookstore I’ve been to in ages. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the staff is not only incredibly friendly but also super knowledgeable about books. They really know how to make you feel at home. For those looking to connect with others, they offer a wide variety of book clubs - such a great way to meet people and engage with the community.

The shop also has a delightful kids’ corner, cozy reading nooks, and a lovely outdoor space perfect for enjoying a good book when the weather’s nice. The carefully curated selection of books makes even just browsing a joy.

But, without a doubt, the highlight of every visit is Libby, the sweetest, most chill dog you’ll ever meet. She’s the perfect bookshop companion and always adds an extra dose of warmth to the experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for your support Kelly! We can't wait to see you at book club soon - we have so many books to discuss!

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookstore with a super cute and sweet dog!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby says "hi" and hopes to see you soon Linda!

reviews_data.review_text: I love small town book stores and this one of best I’ve ever been in. From lazy dog  that was the nicest dog ever to homey feeling it was awesome.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you feel at home here, Ryan!

reviews_data.review_text: This is an incredible book store! My family has been coming since they opened over a year ago. They do an amazing job hosting events and partnering with the local community. They've teamed up with other businesses to host themed book clubs where you get to enjoy the book and visit another business you may not have before (like whiskey tasting at the jailhouse and throwing the first pitch at a baseball game!). They've hosted game nights, which are a lot of fun as well, and have a good selection of beers for game night! They've had local artists decorate their shop. The painted kids stairs up to the treehouse are especially cute! Each stair is painted by a different artist based on a children's book. I highly recommend visiting, and their rewards program is well worth it! (Plus, they have the best bookshop dog! We love seeing her when we visiting and our son loves to sneak her snacks.)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the support, Alec! Libby loves the snacks she "sneaks" from all the little ones :)

reviews_data.review_text: This is a beautiful bookshop with a finely curated selection. I loved the decor and community feel, and my kid loved the themed loft. Super friendly and welcoming. I’d be there all the time if I lived closer.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Come visit us anytime you're nearby, Nicholas!

reviews_data.review_text:
I will start by saying we have always enjoyed visiting the Belmont bookshop, especially with our kids who love the children’s area. Unfortunately, something very upsetting happened during our most recent visit that I feel obligated to share, especially for families.

After checking out, my 4-year-old daughter gently petted the store dog on the head. The dog suddenly stood and lunged toward her face in an aggressive way. Thankfully, no contact was made, but it was close enough to seriously frighten both of us. The owner’s husband was present and witnessed the incident, but said nothing. When I voiced concern and said the dog nearly bit my child, the owner became extremely defensive and dismissive, which only added to the distress of the situation.

It’s deeply upsetting that the owner showed ZERO concern for a child’s safety. I understand people love their pets, but when you choose to have a dog in a public space—especially one frequented by children—there’s a responsibility to ensure everyone is safe and to respond with compassion if something goes wrong.

We won’t be returning.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
This is Brian, co-owner of Belmont Bookshop. I was not present during your visit, but after reading your review, I reviewed the shop's security footage from multiple angles to better understand what happened. 

The footage shows that Libby was lying quietly near the community puzzle table when a different family with a child approached her. Shortly afterwards, your children ran up to pet her. At one point, your daughter leaned over and placed her face close to Libby's while also attempting to lay on her or give her a hug. Libby responded by standing up quickly and vocalizing through a very small, startled yelp (not a bark or growl) that she was uncomfortable before immediately moving away behind the counter. There was no contact made, no lunging, no showing of her teeth, no chasing, and her body language (including a wagging tail) does not suggest any aggression.

Notably, during this same interaction, the other customer was comfortably allowing his young daughter to continue petting Libby, suggesting that other families present did not perceive any concerning behavior.

We understand that this moment felt startling to you as a parent. The footage shows your daughter standing up and running back to you, and while she didn't appear visibly distressed initially, we recognize that the situation became upsetting for your family.

Kristina was present for the entire event and did attempt to acknowledge your expressed concern, while also explaining that Libby did not attempt to bite your daughter and that we regularly ask visitors, especially parents of young children, to help us ensure basic dog etiquette is followed such as asking the owner before petting an unfamiliar dog, and not hugging, leaning on, or putting faces too close to unfamiliar dogs.

Libby, our shop dog, is an important part of our community and the bookshop. She is beloved by almost all visitors, including many young children and families. You are correct that it is always our responsibility to ensure that Libby, our space, and our customers feel safe and always welcome, and please know that we take this type of event very seriously.

If our response came across as dismissive in the moment, we truly apologize. That was never our intention. We care deeply about the safety and comfort of every visitor to our shop, and we are always working to ensure both Libby and our customers have positive interactions.

We're truly sorry to hear you don't plan to return. If you ever change your mind, we'd welcome the chance to reconnect and ensure your family feels comfortable here again.

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookstore with lots of genres. Friendly helpful staff. A great place to browse
reviews_data.owner_answer: And the inventory is always rotating so hopefully we have some new great selections to browse next time you're in!

reviews_data.review_text: Great people and great books. Plus a nice relaxed atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you enjoyed your visit Travis!

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookstore with a very cute employee named Libby.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby is employee of the month...every month! haha

reviews_data.review_text: I just love this book store! Came here back in October with my daughter and sister. They have an adorable kids loft area. I have daydreamed about the puzzle table. So, finally, 8 months later, after having my second baby, I was able to slip away to this lovely store to work on a puzzle and pick a new book for book club.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you got some time away to work on the community puzzle! It's always ready for you :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great little book shop, good selection great vibes
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Michener! Thank you so much for making the time to share your review. We look forward to welcoming you back!

reviews_data.review_text:
Lovely independent bookshop in the quaint little downtown of Belmont! Nicely curated selection, there’s something for everyone.

Beware of the shop dog, Libby! She is an aggressive salesdog and hustled me to buy a bag of locally made dog treats that they sell at the counter.😆
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks for coming by, Leigh! Libby loves those dog treats and we hope your dog does too! 
P.S. for anybody reading this review and not seeing the humor in it at first, Libby is very sweet and most certainly not aggressive :) She does indeed love these treats though!

reviews_data.review_text: What a gem. Not only is the store lovely and inviting and the staff kind and knowledgeable, but they also have books that are sometimes hard to find, in stock.  Loved my visit and will definitely make a must when in the area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Stacy! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back in on your next trip to the area!

reviews_data.review_text: We visited Belmont Bookshop for the first time in support of indie bookshop day. This is such a whimsical welcoming cozy shop. The staff members are so friendly and the selection is literally beautiful and current with the times. Each book I thought to look for was available on the shelf.  I also love the variety of events offered for different ages. You definitely MUST plan a visit to this shop.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for spending some time with us and taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience. We hope yo see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
This bookstore is an absolute gem! The selection of books is so thoughtfully curated — I kept stumbling across titles I’d never seen anywhere else, but instantly wanted to read. It’s the kind of place where you can lose yourself for hours just exploring the shelves.

The adorable doggy makes it the best experience ever. She is so well behaved and absolutely makes my day!

The staff is just as wonderful — welcoming, and genuinely excited to help you find your next favorite book. They clearly love what they do.

The vibe of the entire place is perfect: cozy, inviting, and full of little nooks that make you want to curl up with a book right then and there.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for this kind review, Nil! We're glad to hear you had such a great time. Come back anytime and spend as much time as you like browsing, petting Libby, reading, or working on the puzzle!

reviews_data.review_text: This cozy bookshop is just what Belmont needed! They have something for everyone, including plants and wine! Who doesn’t love that? The owner is one of the sweetest people I’ve ever met, and it’s also a plus that she is usually joined by her sweet dog Libby. They have a great upstairs area for children’s books and host many events throughout the week with local authors, book readings, and more!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kristin! Thank you for spending time with us and being so kind yourself!

reviews_data.review_text:
LOVE THE VIBES. ADORABLE SHOP.

Staff was extremely friendly and the store dog was super chill. She is a very good girl and is extremely sweet. She has the temperament of a stuffed animal. I love the selection they have and unfortunately I did not find any new book that really grabbed me today. I am personally a romantasy fan and I already own many of the books they offered. I really wanted to get a blind book but none of them interested me today. I will recommend this shop to my friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Valerie! Thanks for coming by and spending your afternoon with us. We're glad you enjoyed yourself and felt comfortable. You might be happy to learn that we will soon be expanding a few areas of the bookshop to carry even more titles! We hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this bookshop, they have a great collection of special edition classics and the cute little children’s section upstairs feels like a cool fort. Plus a cute dog! A great addition to the downtown Belmont area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words, Kerrigan! We look forward to welcoming you into the shop on your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: I am participating in the Greater Charlotte book crawl, and this is my first visit to this bookstore. The owner is super sweet and the dog is absolutely adorable. The place is very cozy and has a wide array of romance books, though if you prefer dark romance, there is a very small selection, majority of it is romantsy and romcom. I asked, what is the process for local authors who have their books in that store and there are 2 ways the first way is going to their website and filling out a form. Basically pitching your book, and you go from there. Another way is scheduling an event where you go in-store and basically have a table with your books and you can have one-on-one interaction with potential readers that will buy books from you.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Dana! Thank you making the time to visit all the different bookstores during the GCBC and leaving us a kind review. We recently added Community Nights to our event grid as a way to highlight and celebrate local creators, authors, and artists in a more intentional way. Details are now available on our website under the "Creators" tab. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great bookstore with great gift items too! So thankful to have this in Belmont now!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Amy! We are so thankful to be in a community of supportive people like you!

reviews_data.review_text: Small busy bookstore.  Stopped by passing through from Charlotte, it was packed on a Sunday afternoon.  Their personal shopper was having none of it.  It's all new books, mostly fiction but I managed to find something from my nerd crush to buy.  They had some other interesting books I added to my list.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Malcolm, thanks for taking the time out of your day to visit us on your trip. Next time you are in the area, we hope you'll visit us again and we will be happy to assist you with recommendations or in whatever way we can.

reviews_data.review_text: Very cute little bookshop. Lots of variety in the books offered and the sweetest bookshop pup. They also have drinks and puzzles and things to participate in as well. The kids are upstairs is also really cute.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting! We hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic book store, with a great atmosphere
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Alex! We're glad you enjoyed your time with us.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute bookstore! They have a wide variety of products and my friend had a great time purchasing things!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Rabori, thanks for dropping in! Come back anytime :)

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookshop in lovely Downtown Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi John, thank you for spending time with us and for the great photos! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Cute, downtown book shop with lots of great options.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Love this photo! Thanks for dropping by and spending time with us!

reviews_data.review_text: A wonderful local bookstore that is both cozy and charming. Plus, they have a chill dog. What more could you want?
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby says Hi, Lauryn! Thanks for the kind words :)

reviews_data.review_text: This bookstore is adorable!! Good selection and very friendly staff. Also very kid-friendly.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Michelle!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely adorable bookstore. They have plants, puzzles a children corner upstairs. We loved it here! I will definitely check out their upcoming events :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Vanessa! Thanks so much for coming by and for taking great photos of the shop! We hope you'll join us for some upcoming events which we continue to add to our website!

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection of books. I found some of the favorite books from my younger days along with authors that I'm reading now. Staff is very good at helping me explore books that I haven't read that I’d enjoy. They've made some great recommendations for books I never would have found on my own. And the coffee - just delicious. I always bring home a bag when I visit.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting, Jack! We love our partnership with Enderly Coffee in Charlotte and plan to have our house blend of coffee at all times!

reviews_data.review_text:
If you want to find out where a town is headed, there is no better gauge than its local book store.

Good selection and they quickly helped me find the book I was after.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Duncan! We love our town and are glad that you are a part of our story!

reviews_data.review_text: Beautiful store, great atmosphere. Good selection of books and a few plants.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Joe! Glad to hear your Monstera is healthy and it was nice to chat again. We've got even more plants coming in and look forward to seeing you again next time!

reviews_data.review_text: Very nice store and great customer service.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Kevin! Look forward to seeing you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Cozy bookstore. Nice book selection for kids and young adults.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you feel cozy at the Bookshop, Ceyleen! A relaxed, welcoming, and comfortable atmosphere is our mission.

reviews_data.review_text: Not much of a selection, small store, but what they do have is lovely and well worth a stroll.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kathleen - thank you for visiting and the kind words! We have about 4,000 titles in our 1,200 square feet, about 30% of which are community recommendations. We intentionally carry only one copy of almost all titles in order to have a wider variety across all genres. But we're always looking for more / new recommendations and we do special orders daily, if there is ever something you're looking for but didn't see in the Bookshop, just let us know!

reviews_data.review_text:
I was visiting family in town and found your bookstore so charming. You helped me find an historical novel and you picked "What the Mountains Remember"
Being from Buffalo, I read the Inn was furnished by the Roycrofts from East Aurora. Loved this book and many thanks!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Mary, So glad you enjoyed the Bookshop and "What the Mountains Remember!" Come back and see us (especially when you need a break from the Buffalo cold)!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a well curated nonfiction section!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much! We are always working to expand, rotate, and find new and old titles to bring into the Bookshop. Let us know if there are any you're looking for in particular and we can special order or carry on our shelves.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to browse and buy some unique items. Love the atmosphere and decor. Will definitely become a returning shopper!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words! Let us know if there is ever any super unique items you're looking for but can't find elsewhere; we're always rotating our inventory.

reviews_data.review_text: The vibe is really lovely and cute and their book selection is awesome! The people working there are also very friendly and helpful. Both times I’ve come in, I had no idea what book I wanted to get but got great recommendations from the people working!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Maddy, this makes us so happy to hear! Our team loves giving recommendations and appreciate you being willing to take them!

reviews_data.review_text: The cutest little book shop! They have a ton of books and everyone is very kind and helpful. Will now buy all of my books from here!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Jordan! We appreciate your kind words and your support!

reviews_data.review_text:
Our family absolutely loves this gem. The space for the children is small, but the cutest thing ever. We also love seeing Libby (the dog) as well.

The selection of books is amazing. We easily find books that we want here.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Nyetta! Libby always loves to see you and the family as well :)

reviews_data.review_text: Really comfy chairs and inviting. Great to grab a drink and sit down to start your new book. Really organized and a great location right on the main downtown strip in Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Oh so glad you enjoy the comfy chairs! They are all different but such fun to pick a favorite and snuggle in with a good book.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute little bookshop! Libby is the best and so are her human coworkers.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Haha Libby definitely IS the best! Hardest working employee and star of the show ;)

reviews_data.review_text: Great bookshop with wide selection and friendly people. We love stopping in here after Sunday brunch at the Everyday Market. We haven't been to any events yet but we're looking forward to it. Stop in and say hello and pick up a new read!
reviews_data.owner_answer: What could be better than Sunday brunch and bookshops?! We have a ton of upcoming events, located on our social media and our website events calendar: https://belmontbookshop.com/events

reviews_data.review_text: It's a cute local owner bookstore with a home town cozy feeling. They even had their dog that walks around greeting each new customer. She was very sweet and Adorable.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Libby is a wonderful greeter and can't wait to see you soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Super cute, fun little book shop in downtown Belmont. Curated reads and an engaging owner make for a great spot. My daughter picked up ‘blind date with a book’- such a fun concept! Looks like she serves beer, wine and NA options as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Blind Date books are so much fun! We even have our Blind Date Book Club, similar concept where you don't know what you're going to read, but we give you the genre and clues. Each month is themed and the groups get together to discuss after a month!

reviews_data.review_text: I absolutely adore Belmont Bookshop! 📚 It's the most charming and cozy independent bookshop I've ever been to. The owners are incredibly warm and friendly, and they even host a variety of fantastic book clubs. Belmont Bookshop has definitely won my heart and become my new go-to spot! ❤️
reviews_data.owner_answer: Brandy, what an incredibly kind and heartwarming note! We are so happy the Bookshop is warm and cozy for you! Our book clubs are so much fun (and we've got several new groups on the calendar this year!)

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere, great selection, and I loved having a furry friend to greet me and accompany me as I shopped
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming in, Katie! Libby says "Hi!" :)

reviews_data.review_text:
Belmont Bookshop is a gem! It has the cutest kid area and is conveniently located in downtown Belmont, making it a perfect stop on a family day trip downtown!

Run, don’t walk!

(PS: While you’re there, make sure you say hi to Libby! That sweetest bookshop dog ever.
reviews_data.owner_answer: And while at the Bookshop, be sure to pick up a copy of Eden's book: Arnie the Armadillo!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to relax with a book, or coffee, or tea, or all three.
reviews_data.owner_answer: (plus wine and beer and mocktails and puzzles and...) :)

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont Bookshop is a charming and delightful nook with a great selection of best selling books and the sweetest bookshop dog you ever will meet! Between book clubs, collaborative community events, and a “frequent shopper” rewards program, this gem in downtown Belmont stole my heart the second I entered the door! I will most certainly return often to cozy up with the latest non-fiction release and snuggles from Libby.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the incredibly kind words and support Nicole! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Super cute store. It's so well organized and a very friendly environment. I will definitely be coming back to support this small bookstore.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your support Madison!

reviews_data.review_text: The most magical little bookstore!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Aww we love this so much!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection and vibes!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting!

reviews_data.review_text: They have robo book nook kits! And serve wine! Also the street they are on is so cute with lots of good places to eat!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming to see us and for sharing your nice photos, Elaine! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Extremely friendly staff, a wild range of new books. If you love nature and plants they have a great nature selection with indoor plants for sale. Will come back :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Tori! We look forward to seeing you again :)

reviews_data.review_text: We recently visited Belmont Bookshop for the first time and found it to be a charming, local book seller. Street parking is available as well as a nearby gravel lot. We were greeted by a friendly pup at the door and found a smaller but excellent selection of new books to browse. Our toddler also enjoyed the treehouse area at the back of the store. Of course, we left with a few new books. We will certainly stop back in the next time we visit downtown Belmont!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit to Belmont and to the shop! Hope to see you again!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is unbelievably charming, welcoming, and has some really cool things.  What a great addition to our area. Thanks for the excellent service, Brian!
reviews_data.owner_answer: It was so nice visiting with you Heidi! Hope you come back and visit again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Cute bookstore
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting Alicia - we hope you will visit again!

reviews_data.review_text: Belmont's newest gem - and what a gem it is! There is so much packed into this amazing space - puzzles, plants, books, stationary, and tons more. It is airy and organized. The upstairs Tree House is an especially sweet spot, and the community puzzle is right up my alley. The owner Christina is so friendly and helpful. Can't wait to go back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the review Rebecca! We appreciate you visiting us and hope you will come back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: 10/10 book store! Owners are SO kind & Libby (their dog) hangs out and greets guests. A must shop!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind review, Ally! Hope to see you again, soon!

reviews_data.review_text: What a gem! Visiting from out of town and wandered in here. This is one of the best book stores I have ever visited. Everything was so bright and clean. Books were neatly organized and easy to find. Owner was very nice and helpful.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the kind review and for visiting! We are glad too see that you enjoyed your experience!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place it’s a vibe and the associates are really nice.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Great to meet you Shawna - thanks for dropping us a note and glad you enjoyed your experience at the shop. Look forward to welcoming you back!

reviews_data.review_text: Great addition to the Belmont Main Street. Very dog friendly.  Great selection on books for the adult reader.  If you have children make sure you check out the upstairs tree house for the younger reader. If you develop a thirst walking around Belmont they do have beer and wine along with other non alcoholic beverages.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the note, Howard. Glad you enjoyed our shop and look forward to seeing you again!

reviews_data.review_text: Love the kids nook in the upper section... good selection of books for a smaller store. Cozy feel
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you like the kid's Treehouse, the selection, and the cozy vibes Joshua! We appreciate your support.

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful place to find books and gifts. The owners are so kind and give great book recommendations.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Susana!

reviews_data.review_text:
What an incredible addition to Downtown Belmont! A book store and so much more. See it for yourself. Plants, books, records and coming soon, wine by the glass!

A perfect place to meet up with your friends.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
+ stationary, greeting cards & journals, board games, candles, and beer :)
And most importantly: our shop dog Libby!

reviews_data.review_text: Took my 3 year old grandson to the park, to get an ice cream cone and to visit Belmont Bookshop. As I tucked him into bed that night we talked about his busy day I asked what part of the day was his favorite.  I got a resounding “Bookstore” as an answer!! Going back again today to buy the book he wanted!
reviews_data.owner_answer: This makes us so happy! Thank you for sharing, your support, and coming back to see us!

reviews_data.review_text: Very cool!!! Nothing like shopping in an actual book store!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming in Abbey! We look forward to seeing you again soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: The treehouse area for kids is adorable and the owners are so friendly. We will definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for visiting us! We can't wait to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: What a great spot! Quaint and charming, with a surprisingly nice selection of books. The owners are amazing, and we are very excited to have them in Belmont.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting, Michael! We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!
